About

You can create your own custom avatar for the masthead, change the icon in the dividers, and add your email address to the contact form to make it fully functional!

About Freelancer

Freelance is a free to use, MIT licensed Bootstrap theme created by Start Bootstrap .

Distributed Industrial Measurement System

  • Designed a scalable measurement system with 48 embedded Linux devices, an edge SBC, and Ethernet-bus infrastructure, including custom tooling.
  • Built an open platform that supported multiple product lines while phasing out legacy systems.
  • SSolved core system issues such as time sync, orchestration, and multi-GB logging of text, images, and measurements using SQL and a Qt-based viewer.
  • Platform derivatives generated over 50% of company revenue.
  • Led development of low-level subsystems (Ethernet, SPI, I2C, AXI‑VideoDMA), Yocto BSP, IPC, and multithreaded image processing architecture.

Next-Gen Sensor Platform

  • Replaced legacy CANBus-only sensor concept with a flexible, next-gen embedded sensor platform.
  • Designed to support USB, Ethernet, and I2C sensors while ensuring full compatibility with existing CANBus and IO systems.
  • Integrated new sensor technologies, leading to patented, industry-leading sensing capabilities.
  • Developed a Qt-based UI and connected Platform Controller and Sensor Applications via a REST API for streamlined development and servicing.

Hight Speed Edge Characterization

  • Developed a patented method that combines physics, image processing, and high‑performance edge computing to measure angular gradients on fine edges—solving a problem that stumped multiple university teams.
  • Leveraged native C++ multithreading, OpenMP, and OpenCV to capture and process 1 GB of data (2,000 images) per second, with real‑time visualization via a Qt touch‑panel interface.
  • Enabled full IIoT/Industry 4.0 support through an MQTT interface for continuous quality monitoring and M2M communication.
  • Designed intuitive UI components for streamlined system configuration and calibration.

Qt Commission/Service App

  • Designed and implemented a Qt‑based commissioning and service app that consolidates diverse user requirements and use cases.
  • Empowers assembly teams to calibrate and commission embedded measurement devices, field engineers to troubleshoot remotely, and developers to test new features.
  • Orchestrates clusters of Linux‑based measurement units over raw sockets, MQTT, and REST APIs.
  • Optimized for resource‑constrained industrial edge SBC using multithreading, OpenCV image processing and fully asynchronous design patterns.

Qt Industrial Control and Inspection

  • Designed and implemented a system to compare good vs. bad samples based on customizable customer criteria.
  • Integrated file-based 400GB historical database with recall via barcode scanner and user input.
  • Orchestrated camera arrays and high-precision stepper motors for synchronized data acquisition and fusion.
  • Developed a user-friendly interface for teaching good samples, optimized for trained shop-floor personnel.
  • Employed CPU-GPU hybrid image processing for high performance.

Operator Guide

  • Designed a factory floor production observation system tightly integrated with real-time critical manufacturing steps.
  • Enabled M2M communication with Beckhoff PLCs via MQTT
  • Built a scalable architecture to support future automated inspection systems.
  • Developed an intuitive UI/UX optimized for factory floor use.

2D-3D Data Fusion

  • Established sensor concept could not keep up with required flexibility (limited to CANBus only).
  • Designed a new system concept for the customer's embedded industrial sensors as a new general-purpose platform.
  • New design included full flexibility to use USB, Ethernet, I2C-based sensors while maintaining CANBus and IO compatibility with existing machinery.
  • Developed new sensor integrations based on the new platform, resulting in patented, industry-leading new sensing approaches.
  • Platform Controller Application and Custom Sensor Application are coupled over a general REST API and showcase a small Qt user interface for development and service purposes.

Windows Like Linux Task Manager

  • Built a Linux task manager clone to deepen understanding of Linux kernel interfaces.
  • Set up CI/CD with Jenkins to produce portable AppImage builds.
  • Achieved 70+ stars and 10K+ downloads on GitHub, which places it in top 20% of public repositories
  • https://github.com/rejuce/LikeTaskManager

Submarine

  • Established sensor concept could not keep up with required flexibility (limited to CANBus only).
  • Designed a new system concept for the customer's embedded industrial sensors as a new general-purpose platform.
  • New design included full flexibility to use USB, Ethernet, I2C-based sensors while maintaining CANBus and IO compatibility with existing machinery.
  • Developed new sensor integrations based on the new platform, resulting in patented, industry-leading new sensing approaches.
  • Platform Controller Application and Custom Sensor Application are coupled over a general REST API and showcase a small Qt user interface for development and service purposes.
